CustomField.description: Pulls the value of the Tranche Override picklist from the related Intake record, converted to text for use in formulas, reports, or comparisons.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the Tranche Override selected on the related Intake. Used for reference, filtering, or automation. This value is shown as text and mirrors the selection made on the Intake record.
CustomField.label: fx_Tranche
